DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy online program reducing symptom social anxiety , unhelpful thought , avoidance behaviour , fear negative evaluation improve quality life student above-average social anxiety .
DOC.detailed_description: While many benefit online program treat variety health issue ( i.e. , implementation remote area , cost-effectiveness , etc . ) , primary challenge online format imitate real-life interaction promote reduction symptom . This attempted six-month online program social anxiety . The present study assess efficacy six-month online program measure social anxiety , fear negative evaluation , unhelpful thought , avoidance behaviour quality life . This information collect student baseline upon completion online program .
DOC.criteria: Registered UBC student Achieve aboveaverage score validate screen tool social anxiety Not register UBC student Clinical diagnosis mental illness
